snippet: Brett and Naghmeh King were released three days after being arrested for taking their 5-year-old son to Spain for alternative treatment for a brain tumor.
abstract: British couple Brett and Naghmeh King, parents of 5-year-old boy with a brain tumor, are released from a prison in Spain and reunited with their child after British prosecutors drop charges; couple had been arrested for taking son out of Britain to seek alternative treatment.
lead_paragraph: Brett and Naghmeh King were released three days after being arrested for taking their 5-year-old son to Spain for alternative treatment for a brain tumor.

headline.main: Out of Jail, British Couple Reunite With Ill Son
headline.print_headline: Out of Jail, British Couple Reunite With Ill Son
